item.title: Two potholes on the left hand side - especially dangerous for cyclists, 3rd December
item.description:
On Westbound side of road immediately after the roundabout on Hatherley Road, junction with Warden Hill Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New pothole in the middle of the Hare & Hounds junction Churchdown, 3rd December
item.description:
Hi, there is a new pothole in the middle of the Hare & Hounds junction Churchdown, pretty deep and widening. Could it be repaired ASAP ? Perhaps an overnight repair to minimise traffic disruption ?? It's on the church side as you drive south towards Tesco. Thankyou !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
